page.title: 02Local History, Ecology,Water
page.content: Tumili exist in 1 and 2 Remains of an old settlement exist in 10. Ecology, public rights of way on foot exist in 2,3,6 and 10. Quarries now disused exist in 1,2,3,7 and 12. A Pit now disused is located on the boundary of 9/10. Water Sources, Springs ocur in 1,2,5,6,8,9,10,11 and 12. There is a Well at Penhale Farm (10) and another at Trewaters Farm (1). The Spring in 9 is the source of the Trevella Stream which supplies water for the City of Truro. Many of the existing Springs are still used to supply ater to adjoining farmsteads. Orchards none remaining in the area. Those previously at Killiserth (10) and Boswiddle (11) have been destroyed.
